fullText: Dan Lauria brings gruff authority and unexpected warmth to his portrayal of the legendary Green Bay Packers coach in this workmanlike biographical drama.
dtliExcerpt: Dan Lauria brings gruff authority and unexpected warmth to his portrayal of the legendary Green Bay Packers coach in this workmanlike biographical drama.
